item.title: Added Localazy
item.description: https://localazy.com - Free for unlimited strings, unlimited contributors

item.title: Pika CDN is now Skypack
item.description: https://www.skypack.dev/ - The 100% Native ES Module JavaScript CDN. Free for 1 million requests per domain, per month.

item.title: add ip.city
item.description: https://ip.city - 100 free IP geolocation requests per day

item.title: add pingmeter
item.description: https://pingmeter.com/ - 5 uptime monitors with 10 minutes interval. monitor SSH, HTTP, HTTPS, and any custom TCP ports.

item.title: Add reactflow
item.description: https://www.reactflow.com/ - Per site: 1,000 pages views/day, 3 heatmaps, 3 widgets, free bug tracking

item.title: howuku belongs to session recording category
item.description: https://howuku.com - Track user interaction, engagement, and event. Free for up to 5,000 visits/month

item.title: hotjar was mentioned two times (in analytics and in session recording).
Added Bip
item.description: https://bip.sh - Bip provides zero downtime deployment, a global CDN, SSL, and more for static websites. Free plan with 100GB/month bandwidth.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://amixr.io/ - Developer-friendly alerting and on-call management with brilliant Slack Integration, API and Terraform. Free phone call, SMS, Telegram, Slack and E-Mail packages.

item.title: Free temporary and disposable phone numbers
item.description: https://smsreceivefree.com/ - Provides free temporary and disposable phone numbers.

item.title: Update some PaaS description
item.description:
https://glitch.com/ - Free public/private hosting with features such as code sharing and real-time collaboration. Free plan has 1000 hours/month limit.
https://okteto.com - - Managed Kubernetes service designed for remote development. Free developer accounts come with 8GB of RAM, 4 CPUs and 5GB Disk space. The apps sleep after 24 hours of inactivity.
